mapper.select: select Product.productId, productName, thumbnailImageUrl, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, (select content from Review R where R.productId=Product.productId limit 1) as review from Product left join Review R on Product.productId = R.productId group by Product.productId ORDER BY RAND()

select Product.productId, productName, makerName, thumbnailImageUrl, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, (select content from Review R where R.productId=Product.productId limit 1) as review, TIMESTAMP(OL.updatedAt) date from Product left join Review R on Product.productId = R.productId inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId left join OrderList OL on R.orderListId = OL.orderListId group by Product.productId ORDER BY date DESC

select Product.productId, productName, makerName, thumbnailImageUrl, TIMESTAMP (Product.createdAt) as date from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId group by Product.productId ORDER BY date DESC
